title: Haven: A Pirate Nation - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Haven: A Pirate Nation - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


DESCRIPTION
An alternate history mod featuring a pirate nation called Haven. 

A short while before EU4 starts imagine a gang of pirates led by Captain Jack Morgan on their way to the western coast of Morocco. Imagine a sudden storm sweeping them off west! Imagine after a long and unlikely journey they arrived at new land to the west where they found amazingly lush islands to settle upon! 

Main Features: 

A new fully featured pirate nation settled on the three province island of Les Cayes, Tortuga and Barahonas (modern-day Haiti and Dominican Republic). 
Carefully crafted to allow a fun and flexible way of playing as a pirate nation. Main focus is on piracy, expansion and trade. 
Huge number of custom missions, decisions and events. 
Custom technology and unit types. 
Custom government(Pirate Court) and religion(No Religion/Atheism). 
Custom causus bellis and wargoals. 
A new idea group named LibertÃƒÂ© which is unique to Haven - partly to compensate for them being unable to pick Religious group. New events relating to idea group as well! 
New graphics for pirate tech group and religion. 
The ability to encite Colonial Nations to rebel against their overlords! If you have Espionage ideas and there is a colonial nation with at least 25 opinion of you can get an event to spend gold to give them liberty desire and a negative opinion modifier of their overlord. 
Letters of Marque can be offered to you via events - these gives you several bonuses as well as a special CB. 
All the Republican triggered-only events have been replaced with completely new pirate-specific ones.

Between the years 1600 - 1750 an event will fire called "The Golden Age of Piracy" which gives a bunch of fun bonuses for a hundred years. There are also events relating to a number of real-world famous pirates that can in one way or another join your pirate nation. 

Balance: 

As a pirate nation you are given significant bonuses to spy-related things, trade and naval stats. You're also of course given access to colonizing the rich provinces of the Caribbean and Americas long before the European powers. To counter this you have your own religion and government type and a hefty -20 diplomatic reputation. You also have special CBs (Pirate Superiority and Pirate Naval Superiority) which gives less prestige gain and more Aggressive Expansion. You will find it very difficult to make friends!
